name: Premier Manager 97
overview: Based on the most popular management sim of all time...You make the decisions that will take your team to the top of the Premier division. Complete with all 1996/97 seasons statistics integrated into the game. With nearly 1500 players from all four professional leagues, battery back-up to track your success, an animated scoreboard that gives highlights of the matches, rolling on-screen commentary, and atmospheric in-game graphics - find out if you've got what it takes to become a Premier manager.
